amendment.description: An amendment to strike on page 1, beginning on line 5, "1211 Towanda Avenue in Bloomington, Illinois" and insert "200 West North Street in Normal, Illinois".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Comer amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Comer.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Comer amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Comer amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
